name: To July
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This game downloads as a zip file. To play the game, open the exe called "18023892Brink_GADE7212_POE" in the folder. Thank you!

To July follows the story of June as she struggles to cope with the loss of her partner during the COVID-19 pandemic. 

This game was made as a project for one of my university modules, and only serves as a prototype. Everything except the music and sound was done by me.
